title.rendered: Tapping the Power of Pro: Essentials for Improving Lead Engagement

content.rendered:
Lead Engagement Tips and Strategies for KW Associates

For most real estate agents, the growth of their businesses is impeded by their ability to properly engage with their leads. In this 45-minute educational webinar, senior sales coach Sheldon Rapoza delves into how Keller Williams associates can use the eEdge and Market Leader Pro systems to effectively and efficiently engage with their leads.

Watch this webinar recording to learn about:

  • Must-have lead engagement tools
  • Developing lead engagement plans of attack
  • Consumer behaviors that should trigger engagement responses
  • Lead engagement tips from expert agents

Need More Leads to Engage With?

With Market Leader, you can tap into two sources of a guaranteed number of exclusive buyer and seller leads. These leads are more than just impressions – you can get a steady stream of buyers and sellers delivered directly to you. Check lead availability in your desired ZIP codes today!

Check Lead Availability
